contentfulPagePressRelease.title: HEC Paris in Qatar Promotes Executive MBA Program in Dubai

childMarkdownRemark.html:
HEC Paris, one of the world’s top three providers of Executive Education programs, will be present at the upcoming QS Executive Connect event in Dubai this month to promote its highly acclaimed HEC Paris Executive MBA program offered in Education City.

The HEC Paris Executive MBA is a practical and intense part-time program developed to provide participants with an understanding of the social, economic and environmental aspects of international business, as well as the skills to implement their vision.

For the full story, please click here.
